nodes.text: Anuli was a Human male slicer who served the Hutt underboss, Gele'ren, during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. He was a friend to fellow slicer, Mako.

In 3643 BBY, he assisted Mako's boss, the future Grand Champion of the Great Hunt, in eliminating the Eidolon, but was killed by one of the Eidolon's assassin droids before the hunter was able to save him, along with Gele'ren.
Before he was killed, he uploaded Eidolon Security's private database records on to the HoloNet, a severe blow to the company's business.
